text: 9|42|yadi sahajate sampada labhara asa thakilehemtena arau bhramana sugama ha’lehemtena tente niscaya sihamte tomara anusarana karailehemtena; kintu sihamte yatraapatha sudirgha buli bharaichila, arau anatipalame sihamte allahara sapata lai ka’ba, ‘paraile ami niscaya tomalokara lagata ola'i ga’lohemtena’. Sihamte nije'i nijake dhbansa karae, arau allahe jane ye, niscaya sihamta michaliya.
